duties_responsibilities.duty: Understand growing business needs, evaluate capability gaps, and stand up BI solutions using BI tech stack
Create and maintain an ongoing product roadmap and partner with both the Chief Product Owner and Business Leaders to ensure the product backlog is prioritized and aligns with the strategic objectives
Develop business cases, define business value and OKR’s and track business value once the solution enters production
Ensure alignment of product features and stories, review, give feedback, and prioritize user stories in line with own vision
Coordinate, plan and lead UAT sessions for business stakeholders
Lead sprint and release plans together with the Scrum Master and organizational technology teams
Execute on multiple parallel initiatives to stand up new and support existing solutions within the BI space
Define best practices around user provisioning, security architecture, and identify opportunities for automation
Lead delivery teams comprising of Tech leads, Data Analysts, BI Developers and Data Engineers and provide technical leadership, business expertise and coaching
Present Business Intelligence solutions to executive leadership and generate excitement and gain consensus

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, math or related discipline. Master’s degree preferred
